author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Addressing item 1 of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39194: change L1 modules to start with l1t
Also addressing item 2 of the same issue: Fix hltTriggerSummaryAOD
Also addressing item 5 of the same issue: Verify the PSet cutset in L1TrackSelectionProducerExtended

#### PR validation:

code-checks, code-format
title: [L1T] all modules swicthed to lower case and l1t
